page.title: 09WORK
page.content: Most housewives work part_time and only on a couple of days.My Mum gets up at 6.00am,makes my packed lunch,my brother's dinner and my Dad's.She catches the bus at about 7.00am.My Mum doesn't get home until about 3.00pm. When she does get home she has to cook the tea and then wash the dishes.She doesn't sit down until about 7.30pm. My Dad is an architect.He works every day of the week including Sunday and he only stops when we go on holiday. My brother has to go to college for a week then go on to work.To get a good job nowadays you need to get O levels when you're 16,A levels when you're 18 and spend 3 years at college. There are{3,000,000}people unemployed in England. By{SARAH BACKWAY. { --}----- -------
